SEARCH
Package persistence

Class PersistenceManager

java.lang.Object
persistence.PersistenceManager
public class PersistenceManager extends Object
Controller class for handling persistence operations. This class is basically a Facade that delegates persistence tasks to specific persistence handlers for different entity types

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    answerPersistence
    Persistence handler for Answer entities

    PersistenceManager()

    • saveProfile

      public void saveProfile(Profile profile) throws IOException
      Saves a Profile to persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      profile - Profile to save
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • loadProfile

      public Profile loadProfile(int uuid)
      Loads a Profile from persistent storage by UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the Profile to load
      Returns:
      Loaded Profile, or null if not found

    • deleteProfile

      public boolean deleteProfile(int uuid)
      Deletes a Profile from persistent storage by UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the Profile to delete
      Returns:
      true if the Profile was deleted, false otherwise

    • existsProfile

      public boolean existsProfile(int uuid)
      Checks if a Profile exists in persistent storage by UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - UUID of the Profile to check
      Returns:
      true if the Profile exists, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • exportAffinity

      Exports affinity groups with usernames to a JSON file.
      Parameters:
      groups - List of maps containing affinity group data with usernames
      filePath - Path where the results will be saved
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      Saves an Answer to persistent storage.
      Parameters:
      answer - Answer to save
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • loadAnswer

      public Answer loadAnswer(int ufid, int responderUUID)
      Loads an Answer from persistent storage by UFID and responder UUID.
      Parameters:
      ufid - UFID of the Form associated with the Answer
      responderUUID - UUID of the Profile who submitted the Answer
      Returns:
      Loaded Answer, or null if not found

    • deleteAnswer

      public boolean deleteAnswer(int ufid, int responderUUID)
      Deletes an Answer from persistent storage by UFID and responder UUID.
      Parameters:
      ufid - UFID of the Form associated with the Answer
      responderUUID - UUID of the Profile who submitted the Answer
      Returns:
      true if the Answer was deleted, false otherwise

    • existsAnswer

      public boolean existsAnswer(int ufid, int responderUUID)
      Checks if an Answer exists in persistent storage by UFID and responder UUID.
      Parameters:
      ufid - UFID of the Form associated with the Answer
      responderUUID - UUID of the Profile who submitted the Answer
      Returns:
      true if the Answer exists, false otherwise

    • loadAnswersByForm

      public ArrayList<Answer> loadAnswersByForm(int ufid)
      Loads all Answers associated with a specific Form UFID.
      Parameters:
      ufid - UFID of the Form
      Returns:
      List of Answers associated with the Form

    • deleteAllData

      public boolean deleteAllData()
      Deletes all persistent data (Profiles, Forms, and Answers). Use with caution - this operation cannot be undone.
      Returns:
      true if all data was successfully deleted, false otherwise
